designer.title: Designer
designer.tagline: I value things that have a clean structure, purpose-driven elements, and thought-provoking interactions.

developer.title: Developer
developer.tagline: I'm always trying to build things that enhance my productivity, creativity, and accessibility to useful information.

human.title: Human
human.tagline: I'm American, but currently living in Copenhagen, DK. When I'm not behind a screen, you'll probably find me outside.
